ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR (Proceed_Based_on_Initial_Assessment__c > TODAY(), Funds_Available__c > TODAY(), Data_Dictionary_Obtained_Date__c > TODAY(), Research_Plan_Developed_Date__c > TODAY(), ICFs_Ready_for_Legal_Review__c > TODAY(), Proceed_Based_on_Research_Plan__c > TODAY(), ABAC_Approval_Date__c > TODAY(), Budget_Approval_Date__c > TODAY(), Research_Plan_Finalized__c > TODAY(), Informed_Consent_Forms_Approved__c > TODAY(), Collaboration_Agreement_ready_for_Legal__c > TODAY(), Term_Sheet_agreed_by_RGC_LT__c > TODAY(), All_RCA_Components_Completed__c > TODAY(), RPR_Final_Approval_Date__c > TODAY(), Collaboration_Status_Updated_Date__c > TODAY(), RCA_Signature_Date__c > TODAY(), Term_Sheet_Agreed__c > TODAY (), Key_Stakeholders_Informed_Date__c > TODAY(), Execution_Date__c > TODAY (), Kickoff_Initiated_Date__c > TODAY (), Effective_Date__c > TODAY (), Budget_Itemization_Information_Available__c > TODAY())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Milestone date cannot be in the future.
